Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - good location”
Reviews.Author: bowdenj
Reviews.Content: time stay hotel enjoyed stay nice including kitchen didnt expect free breakfast park level lot luggage convenient car helpful front desk staff assisted incoming fedex package warning arrive breakfast bit crazy morning id rule tried upload photos click happens edit review post add photos

Reviews.Title: “I really like this hotel...”
Reviews.Author: Mary F
Reviews.Content: everytime dallas stay hotel love breakfast beds comfortable space excellent kings wrong caveat costly park shuttle 3 mile radius hotel busy weekend didnt trouble catching shuttle

Reviews.Title: “excellent service will definitely bring me back”
Reviews.Author: swtp232
Reviews.Content: hotel price location staff amazing complimentary parking wait 5 minutes line check cocktail hour evenings nice touch clean appointed appreciated kitchenette bathroom bit dated overall stay definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “A great stay”
Reviews.Author: kabrenee
Reviews.Content: found hyatt suites perfect front desk staff wonderful remembered names helped free shuttle service friendly clean amenities location close downtown easy walk american arena highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Nothing to complain about”
Reviews.Author: volleyballtennisski
Reviews.Content: clean layout decor furniture comfortable photos accurate bed perfect firm mattress shuttle driver 15 minutes hotel staff friendly helpful rates expedia ill probably stay else dallas time explore neighborhoods walk cities city isnt pedestrian friendly frankly didnt downtown fun stroll ill look harder time close visit definitely shot

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel - very convient location”
Reviews.Author: TLD2006
Reviews.Content: happy hotel staff location didnt walk centrally located mile breakfast average nice covered parking rain storm blew thru 2nd 3rd night stayed

Reviews.Title: “SMU Graduation”
Reviews.Author: eighthnote
Reviews.Content: opportunity stay location nights dallas recent smu graduation found location lovely obviously process renovation wallpaper installed hall complimentary breakfast nice hot cold choices experiences staff occasions help costing 18day parking gated entries parking lot secure enjoyed shopping grocery store nearby kitchen able prepare meals improvement thinking shower head flows freely water stands tub ones ankles wasnt dresser bedroom clothes storage wardrobe closet suitcase stand extra helped

Reviews.Title: “Awful noisy stay!”
Reviews.Author: cindysk
Reviews.Content: daughter stayed visit colleges busy harry hines blvd noisy cars weekend people outside til 4am suite updated spacious cons people running front desk accurate information shuttle unavailable runs til 7 pm weekends helpful takes 2 mile radius hotel breakfast suppose stayed 3 nights food breakfast 1 morning mornings 9am suppose til 10am housekeeping 2 days complain front desk difference taxi fares dallas expensive cabbies try rip extra person toll figure beware hotel charge 12night parking fee wi fii sporadic time

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant Stay!”
Reviews.Author: peachberry7
Reviews.Content: husband stayed night property avoid drive home concert american airlines center happy location walking distance avoid crazy traffic outrageous parking prices venue complaints 12 parking fee hotel utilized shuttle service walked means late hour play safe missed evening social service nice learn restaurants delivered late hours menus provided front desk opted chinese food arrived 15 minutes delivery ive encountered anywho complaints property front desk clerks extremely friendly helpful oh breakfast people scoped spread eggs waffles bacon cereal bagels etc etc people experiences staying hotels stay excellent people overly picky hence negative reviews

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay near downtown”
Reviews.Author: DCMatt
Reviews.Content: stayed couple nights business diem available usual hotels dallas pleasantly surprised liked free shuttle downtown happy hour decent breakfast nice comfortable quiet clean efficiency style kitchenette extended stays ill trip dallas

Reviews.Title: “A Good Deal here”
Reviews.Author: happytraveller2576
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 days beginning 25 day usa trip 15 hour flight found hotel easily found days location central convenient hotel staff friendly helpful arrival suite spacious clean ample fridge microwave free internet access free parking free breakfast day clean laundry add inexpensive rate deal travellers furniture decor bit fashioned clean bathroom facilities totally adequate bit fussy

Reviews.Title: “I'll be back yet again! =)”

Reviews.Content: friend booked hotel close downtown dallas booked realized stayed convenient location attending american airlines arena needless upgraded stay 24 day charge parking secure connecting parking garage processed requests accordingly extra pillows near elevator booked king bedroom sofa sleeper clean comfortable snafu corded phone issues cordless phone call front desk serviceman sent efficient phones running time staff checked greeted mark dinner recommendations night pleasant positive asset company 2 ladies checkout friendly thanks nice stay

Reviews.Title: “I won't be back”
Reviews.Author: MattNY
Reviews.Content: wedding downtown dallas hyatt nights hotel love hyatts enjoyed brands didnt twice despite cheery polite front desk staff shelby grace wont wasnt morning stay 4pm late housekeeping left day 5 machines gym 1 properly dont maintain equipment service plan shock amusing manager try treadmill belt move pushing thinking sudden definitely wasnt friendliest person ive met hotel flat screen tvs analog cable service looks cable fraternity house 20 ago fuzzy definitely fitting hdtvs lights bathroom housekeeping didnt tell maintenance fix nice job carpeting floor living roomkitchen reason rubber strip connects gaps rusty exhaust vent covers bathroom noisy ac dirty windows theres view worth looking 12day parking seriously thats plain greedy business hotel horrible bandwidth provisioned 30 minutes phone tech support saturday morning 730am filters mac address 1999 wont support modern vpn connections cabinets bathroom kitchen sort wood grain instead replacing merely painted sort dull brown color stark contrast stainless steel appliance kitchen cabinet doors kitchen pretty crooked look worse positive bed thankfully wonderful hyatt beds slept little details badly wrong choose options exist

Reviews.Title: “Better than we were thinking”
Reviews.Author: EERO42
Reviews.Content: run wich twice world wife travelled 40 countries 3stars hotel service helpful breakfest predinner snacks training tools hotel running route outside start marathon excellent hotel easy driving voice hotel

Reviews.Title: “I didn't want to leave the room.”

Reviews.Content: wow mouth entered stylish extended stay couch amazing bed wonderful sleep bathroom adequate size kitchen nice free breakfast continental breakfasts scrambled eggs potatoes sausage pancakes air conditioning hotel able cold night sleep negative hotel little difficult parking free previously reported love hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very good hotel!”

Reviews.Content: stayed dallas night hotel confortable clean free wifi parking checkin checkout quick receptionist nice kitchen location near price value little shop inside hotel expensive

Reviews.Title: “ALLERGY SUFFERERS BEWARE!!!”
Reviews.Author: Lots0Travel
Reviews.Content: am extremely allergic feather pillows hotels booked hotel nights sleep 2000 3hour examination am taking day called ahead requested nonfeather pillows ok arrived request care im sorry theres time hyatt hotel stayed hyatt albuquerque exact happened appears hyatt book hotel terrible customer service stayed hotels past hyatt consistently disappointed regard hotels

Reviews.Title: “Great staff. Great location.”
Reviews.Author: daffydana
Reviews.Content: stayed boyfriend couple nights enjoyed hotel nice perfect value enjoyed kitchenette sitting nice tv happy spacious clean complaints breakfast welcome arrived little late lady putting food brought cart helped silverware etc makes hotel stand desk staff friendly wasnt feel time bother thanks daniela boss raise definitely assets hotel little tolerance poor service people customer service industry dont jobs add hotel feels secure safe keys enter parking garage doors hotel except course front door gps left truck accidentally left window wouldnt recommend doing happy wasnt stolen im helped garage secure luxury prepared pay dont stay nice location moderate price

Reviews.Content: spent weekend bon jovi concert nice equipped kitchen nice bedroombath comfortable living location wonderful able walk american airlines center concert 14 mile perfectly safe walking hotel concert 1130 night staff friendly helpful didnt eat free breakfast smelled pleasant stay

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Close to American Airlines Arena”
Reviews.Author: BCRoadie
Reviews.Content: travelled april 2010 mainly 10 minute walk arena headed stars game continental breakfast upscale free happy hour chicken guacamole chip salsa beer wine etc booking saved food bill hotel close freeway hear close downtown dallas staff freindly hotel clean parking secure 600 day canada type beds abit odd dont queens stayed king sleeper werent avaialble price booked reccomend property highly told families mavericks players stay cant bad
